channel.title: Git on TLDRBins
channel.description: Recent content in Git on TLDRBins

item.title: Git
item.description: General # Show status git status # Reset the current branch to a previous commit git reset --hard # Show information about files git ls-files --stage # Show current branch git branch # Show commits git log <BRANCH_NAME> --oneline # Show diff, a and b are commit hash # a is the older commit git diff <A_COMMIT_HASH> <B_COMMIT_HASH> # Show commit git show <COMMIT_HASH> # Clone private repo git clone http://<USER>:<TOKEN>@<DOMAIN>/<OWNER>/<REPO>.
